Description.p: Avalon was engaged by Motorola Solutions to assess their WEM implementation and there by redesign the CMA and CDA modules. Ms. Puppala was responsible in redesigning the Products module that includes creating and configuring VCM components from Presentation Templates to content lists. The product pages were broken into several configurable regions for efficiency, manageability, performance and ease of publishing.

PositionHistory.Title: The project involves design and development of two features - Dashboard Service and Resequence Global Update. As an experienced VCM developer Ms. Puppala was responsible to design and develop the backend service layer for the Dashboard on McKesson Connect Portal. Dashboard 1.1 was released to McKesson Connect limited groups where the users are presented with profile based Reports for Analysis. The Reports are generated using google charts that take a JSON Object as input. The dashboard service layer is responsible to generating the JSON object with user specific data retrieved from the database. She was also involved in creating the Resequence Account/Department Global Update feature for McKesson Connect users that involved the accounts or departments by ID/Name in ascending or descending order.

Description.p: The project involves design and development of two features - Dashboard Service and Resequence Global Update. As an experienced VCM developer Ms. Puppala was responsible to design and develop the backend service layer for the Dashboard on McKesson Connect Portal. Dashboard 1.1 was released to McKesson Connect limited groups where the users are presented with profile based Reports for Analysis. The Reports are generated using google charts that take a JSON Object as input. The dashboard service layer is responsible to generating the JSON object with user specific data retrieved from the database. She was also involved in creating the Resequence Account/Department Global Update feature for McKesson Connect users that involved the accounts or departments by ID/Name in ascending or descending order.

PositionHistory.Title: The project involves enhancing the VCM features for publishing. As an experienced VCM developer Ms. Puppala was responsible to ease the process of publishing content for the producers. Many times it is a pain point for the producers to publish content as they needed to click through several windows before publishing the content. She has developed a solution by adding a button on the object editor which fastens the process of publishing.

Description.p: The project involves enhancing the VCM features for publishing. As an experienced VCM developer Ms. Puppala was responsible to ease the process of publishing content for the producers. Many times it is a pain point for the producers to publish content as they needed to click through several windows before publishing the content. She has developed a solution by adding a button on the object editor which fastens the process of publishing.
ANSYS has deployed their www site (

) with OpenText's Web Experience Management Suite 8.0 and engaged Avalon to provide consulting around the creation of their Custom Portal site. The Customer Portal will allow their clients to download software, see product information, socialize with other users, and request service tickets. Madhuri's roles on the project included creating CTDs, developing portlets, migrating assets between environments and developing Social Communities.

As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in building the site Gestra.com. The content of the site will be served from VCM 7.6 using VAP 7.4 and will replace the existing site and it look and feel. Her primary responsibility is to create the site and build the presentation templates to support the site view. The site will be serving the users with 3 different languages English, German and Polish.

As a senior developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in redesigning and developing Invesco's Invesco Perpetual site. Her primary responsibility was to develop and configure USP JSR 168 Portlets that are responsible for rendering site content from Idol search engine. Along with other IDOL admin tasks she also configured IDOL and File System Fetch to index xml files generated via VCM listener into the search engine.
: IDOL 7.5, File System Fetch, Vignette Dynamic Portal Module 7.3, Unified Search Platform (USP), VCM 7.6, Weblogic Application Server.

As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in Stelter's VCM 7.3.0.5 to VCM 7.6 upgrade. Her primary responsibility was to install VCM, create and configure database for use with VCM, configuring DPM on management and live stages, migrate Content Type Definitions and its content, Event Listeners and workflows.
: VCM 7.3.0.5 to 7.6, Vignette Dynamic Site Module (DSM) to Vignette Dynamic Portal Module 7.5, Weblogic Application Server.

PositionHistory.Title: Vignette Consultant
PositionHistory.OrganizationName: University of Texas Southwestern, Simmons Cancer Center

Description.p: As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in UTSW's Simmons Cancer Center site development. Her primary responsibility was to design and develop new Content Type Definitions, creating Site and channel hierarchy, identifying presentation templates on the VCM. On the CDA side she was involved in writing the presentation overrides, creating VAP assets like grids, navigation items, pages and portlets etc.
: VCM 7.5, VAP, Vignette Dynamic Portal Module (DPM) and Weblogic Application Server.

As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in Navistar's VCM 7.5 internationalization project. Her primary responsibility was to migrate Content Type Definitions and its content, configuring CTD'S to support internationalization. On the CDA side she was involved in re-writing the presentation overrides with localized content based on user's language selection. The site supports six languages namely English, French, Chinese, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish.
: VCM 7.5, Vignette Dynamic Portal Module (DPM), Tomcat and Weblogic Application Server.

As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala is involved in Flowserve's VCM 7.3.0.5 to VCM 7.6 upgrade. Her primary responsibility was to migrate Content Type Definitions and its content, Event Listeners and workflows. On the CDA side she was involved in re-writing the presentation overrides.
: VCM 7.3.0.5 to 7.6, Vignette Dynamic Site Module (DSM) to Vignette Dynamic Portal Module 7.5, Weblogic Application Server.

As a senior Vignette developer, Ms. Puppala designed, installed and implemented the WSIB Search presentation application with VCM and DPM. The application provides a unique user friendly and efficient search interface for finding Employers, Workers, claims etc.
: IDOL 5, Vignette Dynamic Site Module (DSM) 7.5, Websphere Application Server 6.1.0.9, Apache Tomcat 5.5.

As a senior search developer, Ms. Puppala implemented the Search solution for Pepsico Knowledge Management team (Goldmind Portal). This unified search tool integrated search results from five different repositories. Important features included security, guided navigation, and field searching tailored to each result type.
: IDOL 5.1.0.6, File System Connector 5.x, Omni Group Server 5.x, Solaris 6.x, Vignette Application Portal (VAP) 7.3.1, JSR-168, JAXB/P 2.0, XTags.

This project was developed for McKesson Corporation as the online resource for ordering, tracking and invoicing pharmaceuticals and medical-surgical supplies. This is a one-stop place for Order Mangement, Catalog Search, Reports and Analysis, Account Management, Decision Support tools and Contracts.

ul.li: Design, develop, and test VCM extension of Metadata widgets
Support functionalities in Supply Management Online Application
Developed previews for all VCM content types
Involved in code refactoring and code optimizations for performance improvements

Description.p: Vignette VCM, Vignette Application Portal, Dynamic Portal Module(DPM), Oracle.

Integrate Autonomy IDOL's conceptual search technology with a custom Vignette Content Management (VCM) widget to display content IDOL identifies as conceptually similar. This reduces content authors' effort in finding related articles.

ul.li: Design, develop, and test integration between Autonomy IDOL and Vignette VCM
Overcome roadblocks in Javascript, JSP, RDBMS, and search engine layers

Description.p: : This project involved improving end user search experience using state of the art search technology Autonomy IDOL.

ul.li: Developed custom content management listener using Java to generate files with metadata for indexing into Autonomy IDOL.
System respects security based on user roles
Configured File System Fetch to fetch and index data generated by content management listener

Description.p: Autonomy IDOL, File System Fetch, Vignette VCM

PositionHistory.Title: : The project involves developing the stelter.com site using Vignette Dynamic Site Module (DSM) software. The DSM provides a set of taglibraries and APIs that help in retrieving cached VCM content and in improving performance.

Description.p: : The project involves developing the stelter.com site using Vignette Dynamic Site Module (DSM) software. The DSM provides a set of taglibraries and APIs that help in retrieving cached VCM content and in improving performance.

ul.li: Installation and configuration of DSM software.
Design and creation of CTD's
Compiled JSP's to render VCM content
Created templates, Content Instances, sites, project and other data resources

ul.li: Created DSM regions wherever required
Compare performance difference

Description.p: : The Collaboration listener is responsible for retrieving VCM objects and writing them to the file system which is picked up by the FileSystemFetch for passing on to Autonomy IDOL for indexing.

ul.li: Compiled listener code to write VCM object properties into HTML file.
Defined index tasks for IDOL
Developed a custom security for IDOL.

Description.p: J2EE, Autonomy IDOL, File System Fetch

: The purpose of this filescan is to read files from the file sysem and import them into the content management system (VCM). The application will be able to add, update and delete the files based on changes in the file system. Additionally, if a directory has been removed the corresponding VCM project should be removed as well.

ul.li: Used Vignette VCM public API to communicate with VCM and manipulate objects.
Developing a highly configurable application.
Used Log4j logging tool to track process and debug issues (if any)
Performed Unit Testing

Description.p: : Amdocs Billing provides flexible, real-time rating and billing for all voice, data, content and video services, as well as enhanced support for a broad range of billing-related activities. It supports prepaid-postpaid and wireline-wireless-cable-satellite convergence with one product.

ul.li: Worked on designing and implementing various business needs within the Integration layer. The integration layer interacts with the two major components of Amdocs Billing System namely: Distributed Data Processing (DDP) and Amdocs Broadband, Cable and Satellite (BCS).
Developed High Level Design (HLD) and implemented the createChargeLevelCredits API.
Implemented and unit tested CreateNewSubscriber,AddOffers and RemoveOffers API Designed and developed MassCycleChange API
Worked on modifications to PC Admin UI using Struts
Performed Unit Testing using CTestand Performance Test for the API's developed.

Description.p: J2EE, EJB2.0, XML, Weblogic8.0, Eclipse, Perforce, Oracle 10G, Struts Framework.

: The goal of WCM Solutions team is to provide solutions to common issues faced by the customers few of them being widgets, enhanced objects display for Sites, Channels etc. across various pages in the VCM.

ul.li: Developed Functional Requirement Specification (FRS) for Widgets Common Base Layer.
Created Software Design Document (SDD) and Use Cases.
Designed and developed common base features for widgets using Widget, SPF and PPF Framework, Spring andHibernate.
Worked on code internationalization and logging.
Developed xsl code for transformation, Studied and Implemented AJAX. Written Tag Libraries for JSP rendering.
Performed Code Review and Reviewed QA Test Cases
Performed Unit Testing using JUNITDeveloped Acceptance, andPerformance Test cases for the application.
Worked closely with the Project Manager and Client assessing the progress, dependencies and risk aspects of the project.
